Desc.entry: A registered charity which aims to promote the study and conservation of local mammals. Meetings are open to anyone with an active interest in mammals. Acts as the local group for the Mammal Society. Currently organising a survey of Sheffield mammals and an atlas of Derbyshire mammals.

Pubs.entry: Atlas of Sheffield Mammals, Sheffield Bat Atlas, Mammals of Derbyshire, leaflets

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Field meetings are held throughout the year, details in the Sorby Newsletter
